title: Wood golem
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a list of all golems, see [list of constructs](/List_of_constructs "List of constructs").*

| wood golem 8 \[\[File:{{{tile\_name}}}.png\|32px]]           |                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                               | 37 - 54                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                   | 6                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                               | 189                                                                                                                                                                              |

| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                     | 6                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                               | Immune                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Attack1                                                      | 10 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                      | [rPois+](/Poison "Poison"), [rC+](/Cold "Cold"), [rElec](/Electricity "Electricity"), [rRot](/Rot "Rot"), [rN+](/Negative_energy "Negative energy"), [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")            | [Fire](/Fire "Fire")                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                | land                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence") | [Plant](/Category:Plant_intelligence "Category:Plant intelligence")                                                                                                              |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                             | [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors")                                                                                                                         |

|   |                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A huge animated wooden figure. It is highly inflammable. |

## Useful Info

**Wood golems** are large constructs made of solid wood. Although immune to [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") and resistant to most elemental attacks, they have little physical defense and burn easily. They are rarely encountered in [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"), usually in specific [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Tips & Tricks

- Even without fire damage, their elemental resistances aren't perfect. Elementalists may require a few extra castings to take them down, but they aren't too threatening even then.

## History

Wood golems were removed in [0.12](/0.12 "0.12").
html:
Wood golem

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all golems, see list of constructs.

wood golem 8 [[File:{{{tile_name}}}.png|32px]]
HP 37 - 54
HD 6
XP 189
Speed 10
AC 5
EV 6
Will Immune
Attack1 10 (hit: plain)


Resistances rPois+, rC+, rElec, rRot, rN+, rTorm
Vulnerabilities Fire
Habitat land
Intelligence Plant
Uses Open doors
Holiness Non-living
Size Large
Type clay golem, wood golem
Flags None
A huge animated wooden figure. It is highly inflammable.

Useful Info

Wood golems are large constructs made of solid wood. Although immune to Hexes and resistant to most elemental attacks, they have little physical defense and burn easily. They are rarely encountered in the Dungeon, usually in specific vaults.

Tips & Tricks

  • Even without fire damage, their elemental resistances aren't perfect. Elementalists may require a few extra castings to take them down, but they aren't too threatening even then.

History

Wood golems were removed in 0.12.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Wood_golem&oldid=25628"

==Useful Info==
'''Wood golems''' are large constructs made of solid wood. Although immune to [[Hexes]] and resistant to most elemental attacks, they have little physical defense and burn easily. They are rarely encountered in [[the Dungeon]], usually in specific [[vault]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Even without fire damage, their elemental resistances aren't perfect. Elementalists may require a few extra castings to take them down, but they aren't too threatening even then.

==History==
Wood golems were removed in [[0.12]].
